infos.title: Tempting Winds
infos.dislike: Nasty customers Greasy hair Bad odor
infos.story: She's the owner of 'Gold Bar,' the biggest and the most luxurious tavern in Vespia. Beneath its flashy exterior, the tavern actually serves as a secret meeting place for the social elites, where invaluable secret information is constantly exchanged. Her natural charm and conversation skills can easily break down personal barriers and win the trust of others. Her true identity is a dealer of secret information and weapons.
infos.story_: She's the owner of 'Gold Bar,' the biggest and the most luxurious tavern in Vespia. Beneath its flashy exterior, the tavern actually serves as a secret meeting place for the social elites, where invaluable secret information is constantly exchanged. Her natural charm and conversation skills can easily break down personal barriers and win the trust of others. Her true identity is a dealer of secret information and weapons.

1.name: Softly~
1.description: Heals all allies by ??? HP and deals ??? M.DMG to all enemies. Hit enemies are inflicted by Silence for 2 sec.

2.name: Fiercely!
2.description: For 15 sec, all allies' ATK is increased by ??? and Crit Chance is increased by 700.

3.name: Tempting Wave
3.description: Deals ??? M.DMG to an enemy with the highest ATK. If this skill is used in Arena, inflicts Charm on the target for 7 sec. If this skill is used outside the Arena, enemy takes 25% increased M.DMG. Charmed enemies cannot use any skills, and deals auto attack to own allies.

4.name: Gentle Touch
4.description: At the start of each battle, reduces mana cost by 2 orbs for a single skill, and all allies' DEF is increased by ??? for 5 sec.

1.II: DMG and Heal Rate are increased by 10%.
1.III: DMG and Heal Rate are increased by 15%.
1.IV: Silence duration is increased by 0.5 sec.

3.IV: Charm duration is increased by 1 sec.

light.effect: Healed allies gain a 200 ATK Spd boost for 10 sec.

dark.effect: For 5 sec, hit enemies have their Mana reduced by 200 every second.

light.effect: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
All DMG upon allies is reduced by 20% for 5 sec.

dark.effect: DEF increase effect has its duration increased by 5 sec.
At the beginning of each battle, a random ally is immune to DMG for 3 sec.

uw.name: Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze
uw.description: Skill hits increase the M.DMG that the target takes by (0) for 10 sec. Every 8 sec, heals the ally with the lowest HP by (1) of own ATK and dispels all negative effects from the ally.
uw.story: Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

1.name: Feather Decoration of Crimson Bird
1.description: [Softly~] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and the duration of Silence by (0) sec.
1.story: A decoration made with a feather of the Crimson Bird, a beautiful yet dangerous evil beast. The feather usually exudes dark energy, but it illuminates the surrounding area with a red glow when exposed to light. The color is too splendid and brilliant for feeble minds to escape the hallucination it creates.

2.name: Fancy Ornament
2.description: [Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by (0).
2.story: A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent. A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik. Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one. His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage. There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

3.name: Golden Fragrance
3.description: [Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by (0) sec.
3.story: A legendary gold flame necklace pendant. The legendary Gold King made this gold flame necklace pendant to get the attention of the Goddess of Love and Beauty. Its gold scent creates a Tempting Wave that makes anyone join their side and be loved by everyone.

4.name: Reed Diffuser of Seduction
4.description: [Gentle Touch] DEF boost becomes irremovable. All allies have their All Crit Resistance increased by (0) for 10 sec.
4.story: A reed diffuser that Cassandra bought at a black market merchant from the east. It has a strong scent of azalea. The liquid inside contains a special substance that stirs people's minds, and those who smelt it for an extended period time would confess their deepest secrets. Unless there is a dire need of information, Cassandra does not use the diffuser because it is nearly impossible to buy it again.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
sw.description: Summons the soul of Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze for 10 sec, increasing ATK Spd of all allies yb 300, dealing ??? M.DMG to all enemies, and increasing M.DMG they take by 25% for 10 sec. Upon using this Skill at the Arena, inflicts Charm to all enemies for 5 sec.

advancement.1: Changes Skill Activation requirements to 3 times.
advancement.2: Upon activation, recovers Mana of all allies by 2000 and increases Crit DMG by 80% for the duration of Skill.

sw.story:
Goldbreeze is a beautiful fan that hides its fatal side. It was used by many noblewomen to resolve their desire, envy, and jealousy.
In the process, Goldbreeze was soaked in the blood of many and was feared as a cursed fan that harms its master.

Howver, its fate took a turn when Cassandra purchased the fan from a junk shop.
Cassandra was beautiful and fatal as the fan, and she didn't treat Goldbreeze as a tool to show off or for vanity.
Cassandra sometimes used the fan elegantly, sometimes sharply, and sometimes boldly. Among those who faced Cassandra with her fan, some became slaves to her beauty, some became regular customers, and some fell to her feet.

Eventually Goldbreeze acknowledged Cassandra's ability and showed herself-- A beautiful noblewomen whose face is covered with a mask... One could never imagine that it was the true form of a fatal weapon that harmed hundreds of lives.

But Cassandra knew more than anyone that the prettier the rose, the sharper its thorns.
